entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Flurries beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
